gpml.data_preparation package

Submodules

gpml.data_preparation.data_frame_handler module

This module provides functionalities for analyzing and computing network community metrics over dynamic graphs.

It includes functions to process graphs based on data read from CSV files, compute various 1rst and 2nd order community metrics, and incorporate those metrics back into the data for further analysis. The module supports multiplecommunity detection strategies and offers tools for dynamic graph analysis.

Functions:

chunk_read_and_insert_gc_metrics - Processes chunks of CSV data to compute community metrics and outputs to a new CSV. insert_graph_community_metrics - Computes community metrics for a given dataframe and updates it with new metrics columns.

Contributors:

Julien MICHEL

Project started on:

11/10/2022

gpml.data_preparation.data_frame_handler.chunk_read_and_insert_gc_metrics(file_name, output_csv, time_interval, header=None, community_strategy='louvain', chunksize=5000000, date_time='Date time', edge_source=None, edge_dest=None, label='Label', name='default')[source]

Use pandas to read a csv by chunk and write another csv with the same field + graph communities metrics.

Return type:

output csv file with community metrics

:param : :type : param file_name: input csv file :param : :type : param time_interval: timedelta of graph window :param : :type : param community_strategy: Nodes id list :param : :type : param chunksize: nb of csv line to load in memory as int :param : :type : param date_time: Name of the date field in csv :param : :type : param edge_source: Name of field in csv for edge source id as list :param : :type : param edge_dest: Name of field in csv for edge destination id as list :param : :type : param label: Name of the label filed in csv :param : :type : param name: naming suffix for metrics

gpml.data_preparation.data_frame_handler.insert_graph_community_metrics(dataframe, time_interval, date_time, edge_source, edge_dest, label, name, date_timestamp, community_strategy='louvain')[source]

Take a dataframe, represent it on dynamic graph and compute community metrics.

Return type:

return dataframe with community metrics

:param : :type : param dataframe: pd.DataFrame() :param : :type : param time_interval: timedelta of graph window :param : :type : param date_time: Name of the date field in dataframe :param : :type : param edge_source: Name of field in dataframe for edge source id as list :param : :type : param edge_dest: Name of field in dataframe for edge destination id as list :param : :type : param label: Name of the target column in dataframe as str :param : :type : param name: name to attach to new column :param : :type : param date_timestamp: True or False if date column type is already timestamp

gpml.data_preparation.graph_extractor module

This module provides tools for constructing and analyzing network graphs from CSV.

Contributors:

Julien MICHEL

Project started on:

11/10/2022

gpml.data_preparation.graph_extractor.create_static_graph_from_csv(file_name, edge_source, edge_dest, label, sampling=1)[source]

Take a csv and represent rows as edges of a graph to create the graph representation.

Return type:

return a multigraph representing the chosen csv file

:param : :type : param file_name: Input csv file :param : :type : param edge_source: Name of field in csv for edge source as list :param : :type : param edge_dest: Name of field in csv for edge destination as list :param : :type : param label: Name of the field for label in the csv :param : :type : param sampling: Percentage of sample taken from csv data

gpml.data_preparation.time_series_extractor module

This module provides functionalities for analyzing and transforming network traffic data.

Functions:

timeseries_transformation - Converts raw data into a time series format by grouping and aggregating specified features. extract_spectrum - Constructs a graph from time window data and computes its spectral properties. get_first_value - Retrieves the first value in a pandas series. timewindow_transformation - Applies time windowing techniques on the time series data, computing various spectral metrics for each window.

Contributors:

Majed JABER

Project started on:

11/10/2022

gpml.data_preparation.time_series_extractor.time_series_extractor(df, stime, time_unit, features_list, sortby_list, groupby_list, aggregation_dict)[source]

Convert raw data into a time series format by grouping and aggregating specified features.

:param : :type : param df: pd.DataFrame - The input dataframe containing raw network data. :param : :type : param features_list: list - The list of features to extract and transform. :param : :type : param sortby_list: list - The list of columns to sort by. :param : :type : param groupby_list: list - The list of columns to group by. :param : :type : param aggregation_dict: dict - A dictionary specifying the aggregation operations for each feature.

Return type:

pd.DataFrame - The transformed dataframe in time series format.

Module contents

Module for creating graph and applying the library on pandas dataframes or csv datasets.
